Hair Straightening Services

At Luxe, we are experts in hair straightening, smoothing and relaxing treatments.  We pride ourselves on staying up to date with innovative technologies including Nanoplasty and Pure Luxe, to ensure our clients have access to the best treatments on the market.

More details about each treatment appear below, and bookings can be made by calling us on (02) 9412 1244 or using our online booking form.

Did you know that we are more than just a salon?

We are not only the best blonde hairdresser in Sydney – we also curate and sell a large range of the world’s most exclusive and luxurious haircare brands such as Davines, Oribe, Kevin Murphy and Color Wow
